events.message: The applicant has successfully submitted the personal loan application online, specifying the loan purpose as covering medical expenses and some outstanding debts.
The application has been categorised under Personal Loan category based on the loan purpose stated as medical bills and debt repayment.
Loan Officer Jane Smith assigned to handle the case and ready to initiate communication with the applicant for further details.
Initial review completed, verifying applicant's basic information, requested loan amount, and cross-checking preliminary eligibility criteria.
Applicant requested to submit medical bills, recent pay slips, and identity verification documents for further processing.
The applicant has provided all requested documents including medical invoices, pay slips, and identification, facilitating timely progress.
Credit check executed with no outstanding negative marks, confirming creditworthiness and history suitable for personal loan approval.
Risk assessment conducted, indicating a low risk based on applicant’s stable income and current financial standing.
A loan offer detailing interest rate, repayment schedule, and terms was presented to the applicant for review and acceptance.
Applicant provided positive feedback expressing agreement with the loan terms and readiness to proceed with acceptance.
Loan has been officially approved by the credit committee, confirming all criteria have been satisfactorily met.
Approved loan amount has been disbursed to the applicant’s bank account as per the agreed schedule.
Follow-up call made with the applicant to ensure satisfaction and clarify any questions regarding loan repayment procedures.
The personal loan application file has been closed following successful disbursement and post-approval confirmation.
